pageSetting.title: 客户星级评定贡献项得分导入

sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'统计日期输入错误，格式应该是:yyyyMMdd!' where f_java_rule_date(t.tjrq,'yyyyMMdd')=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'贡献项值输入错误，只能输入:20位整数,2位小数!' where f_java_rule_length(t.gxxz)>0 and f_java_rule_number(t.gxxz,20,2)=1 and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ UPDATE khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t SET t.error= (SELECT t.error ||'起始日期不能小于(系统日期-重跑天数)' || CAST(f_change_days(CAST(rq.csz AS INTEGER),-CAST(cs.csz AS INTEGER )) AS CHAR(8)) ||'!' AS error FROM xtb_xtcs rq , xtb_xtcs cs WHERE rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' AND cs.csmc ='SYS_CSTS' ) WHERE CAST(t.tjrq AS INTEGER)< (SELECT f_change_days(CAST(rq.csz AS INTEGER ),-CAST(cs.csz AS INTEGER )) FROM xtb_xtcs rq , xtb_xtcs cs WHERE rq.csmc='SYS_DATE' AND cs.csmc ='SYS_CSTS' ) AND (error='' OR ERROR IS NULL) AND khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set error=error||'评定方案不存在或者该客户号对应的客户类别在统计日期当年的星级评定配置不匹配!' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM KHDX_KHFL KHFL, KHXJ_PDFA PDFA WHERE F_IS_EXISTS_STR(PDFA.KHLB,RTRIM(KHFL.KHLB),',')>0 AND cast(T.TJRQ as integer) BETWEEN KHFL.QSRQ AND KHFL.JSRQ AND PDFA.PDMC = T.PDBH AND CAST(SUBSTR(T.TJRQ,1,4) AS INTEGER)=PDFA.PDNF and KHFL.KHH = t.khh ) and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set error=error||'贡献项名称不存在!' WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM KHXJ_PDFA PDFA INNER JOIN KHXJ_GXXPZ GXXPZ ON GXXPZ.PDBH = PDFA.PDBH and GXXPZ.JSFS='2' where pdfa.pdmc = t.pdbh and gxxpz.gxxmc=t.gxxmc and cast(SUBSTR(t.tjrq,1,4) as integer)=PDFA.PDNF )and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set t.error=t.error||'数据已存在!' where exists( select 1 from KHXJ_PDGXXSGLR tar ,KHXJ_PDFA KHXJ_PDFA0 ,KHXJ_GXXPZ pz where 1=1 and cast(t.tjrq as INTEGER)=tar.TJRQ and t.khh =tar.KHH and t.pdbh=KHXJ_PDFA0.PDMC and KHXJ_PDFA0.PDBH=tar.PDBH AND pz.PDBH = KHXJ_PDFA0.PDBH and pz.GXXMC =t.gxxmc AND tar.GXXBH = pz.GXXBH and t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (length(t.error)=0 or t.error is null ) )

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update $temp$ t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from ( select tjrq,khh,pdbh,gxxmc from $temp$ dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,khh,pdbh,gxxmc having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.khh=dr.khh and t.pdbh=dr.pdbh AND t.gxxmc = dr.gxxmc ) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t set t.error=error||'存在重复数据!' where exists( select 1 from (select tjrq,khh,pdbh from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp dr where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ group by tjrq,khh,pdbh having count(1)>1 ) dr where 1=1 and t.tjrq=dr.tjrq and t.khh=dr.khh and t.pdbh=dr.pdbh) and khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ CREATE TABLE khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp ( tjrq varchar(100) , khh varchar(100) , pdbh varchar(100) , gxxmc varchar(100) , gxxz varchar(100) , bzsm varchar(500) , khdxdh integer,error varchar(1000) )
sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp where length(error) > 0 and error != '数据已存在!' and khdxdh = $login_khdxdh$
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,khh,pdbh,gxxmc,gxxz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and length(error)>0
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from (select '' as zt, tjrq,khh,pdbh,gxxmc,gxxz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ )a
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select '' as zt, tjrq,khh,pdbh,gxxmc,gxxz,bzsm,khdxdh,error from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp where khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$
sqlMap.insert: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ insert into KHXJ_PDGXXSGLR(TJRQ,KHH,PDBH,GXXBH,KHMC,KHLB,GXXMC,GXXZ,BZSM) select cast (t.tjrq as INTEGER), t.khh ,KHXJ_PDFA0.PDBH, pz.gxxbh,KHDX_KHFL1.KHMC,'', t.gxxmc , cast (t.gxxz as DECIMAL(25,4)), t.bzsm from khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t ,KHXJ_PDFA KHXJ_PDFA0,KHDX_KHFL KHDX_KHFL1, KHXJ_GXXPZ pz where t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) and KHXJ_PDFA0.PDMC=cast (t.pdbh as VARCHAR(200)) and KHDX_KHFL1.KHH=cast (t.khh as VARCHAR(30)) AND CAST(t.tjrq AS INTEGER) BETWEEN KHDX_KHFL1.qsrq and KHDX_KHFL1.JSRQ AND pz.PDBH = KHXJ_PDFA0.PDBH AND pz.GXXMC = t.gxxmc
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update KHXJ_PDGXXSGLR SGLR SET SGLR.khlb=( SELECT KHFL.khlb FROM KHDX_KHFL KHFL WHERE KHFL.KHH=SGLR.KHH AND SGLR.tjrq BETWEEN KHFL.QSRQ AND KHFL.JSRQ )
sqlMap.delete: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ delete FROM KHXJ_PDGXXSGLR sl WHERE EXISTS( SELECT 1 FROM khxjpdgxxdfdr_temp t INNER JOIN KHXJ_PDFA fa ON fa.PDMC = t.pdbh AND cast(SUBSTR(t.tjrq,1,4) as integer)=fa.PDNF INNER JOIN KHDX_KHFL kf ON kf.KHH = t.khh AND CAST(t.tjrq AS INTEGER) BETWEEN kf.QSRQ AND kf.JSRQ INNER JOIN KHXJ_GXXPZ pz ON pz.PDBH = fa.PDBH AND pz.GXXMC = t.gxxmc WHERE t.khdxdh=$login_khdxdh$ and (t.error = '数据已存在!' or length(t.error) = 0 or t.error is null) AND CAST(t.tjrq AS INTEGER) = sl.tjrq AND kf.KHH = sl.khh AND fa.PDBH = sl.pdbh AND sl.gxxbh = pz.GXXBH )
sqlMap.update: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ update KHXJ_PDGXXSGLR SGLR SET SGLR.khlb=( SELECT KHFL.khlb FROM KHDX_KHFL KHFL WHERE KHFL.KHH=SGLR.KHH AND SGLR.tjrq BETWEEN KHFL.QSRQ AND KHFL.JSRQ )
